[source, php]
----
$params = [
    'index' => 'metricbeat-2016.05.30',
    'id' => '1',
    'body' => [
        'system.cpu.idle.pct' => 0.908,
    ],
];
$response = $client->index($params);
$params = [
    'index' => 'metricbeat-2016.05.31',
    'id' => '1',
    'body' => [
        'system.cpu.idle.pct' => 0.105,
    ],
];
$response = $client->index($params);
----
